column100:
KOMPAN’s purpose is to help our customers create a healthier and happier society and have done so since 1970. We are market leaders in delivering state of the art playground and fitness sites. We design, produce, and install more than 1,000 playground and fitness areas each month across 90 countries - corresponding to an installation every 44th minute.  
 Based at our headquarter in Odense, Denmark, KOMPAN is a world leader in the industry and is now searching for a Senior Manager Business Controlling, who will be responsible for Group Business Controlling.  
 Management of Business Controlling team  
 To take on this role, you have a deep interest in and a solid understanding of business controlling at senior level. You will be responsible for our Group Business Controlling and provide analysis to support business decision making. 
 To succeed in this role, you are persistent, cooperative, and have a good understanding of international business.  
 Not only will you get deep insight into and a thorough understanding of our global organization, but you will also provide great support to Group Finance, Group management and Business entities.  
 Key Tasks and Experience  
 Your key tasks will include: 
 
 Ensuring forecasting models and market deep dive 
 Competitor analysis and market analysis  
 Financial forecasting  
 Financial and Operational Performance tracking  
 Supporting strategical decision making  
 Price structure, modelling and development  
 Margin controlling 
 Cost controlling 
 Networking capital controlling 
 Project management 
 
 Our ideal candidate has the following skills and experience:  
 
 A minimum of 3-4 years’ experience in driving processes within business controlling at a senior level 
 Knowledge of daughter company structure in an international setup  
 Specialist within business controlling 
 Good understanding of how to develop international business  
 
 You are fluent in English as well as Danish. You will work from our HQ in Odense, Denmark. 
 Let’s Play! 
 The KOMPAN Group is the global market leader within the playground and outdoor fitness industry. KOMPAN develops, produces, and markets an extensive range of playgrounds, play-sport and fitness equipment that cover all age groups. All KOMPAN playgrounds and fitness sites are designed from the ground up to support health and learning.  
 The solutions offer compelling design, high play value, uncompromising safety, unique innovation, and long-lasting quality. KOMPAN Group employs approx. 1.850 employees globally with sales companies in 25 countries and distributors and agents in more than 65 countries.
